description: porcelain basket and stand; after Meissen original; stand applied with two putti on a tree stump; painted with scattered flower sprays; the oval bowl with peony, prunus and chrysanthemum sprays; iron red and gilt scroll rim
dimension: a (basket): H.4-1/8 x L.8-1/2 x W.6-5/8 in.; b (stand): H.11-7/8 x D. (slightly irregular) 6 in.
title: Lemon Basket and Stand
